sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="submitupdateQuestionForm" class="post-text ml-3 w-100 row">
    {{questionToupdate}}
</form>
</template>
<script>
import useVuelidate from "@vuelidate/core";
import { required, minLength } from "@vuelidate/validators";
import questionServices from '../../api/questionServices'
export default {
  name: "UpdateQuestion",
  created() {

  },
  setup() {
    return { v$: useVuelidate() };
  },
  props: {
    questionToupdate: {
      type: [Object],
      required: true,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      updateQuestionForm: {
      },
    };
  },
  validations() {
    return {
      updateQuestionForm: {
        question: {
          required
        }, starting_page: {
          required
        }, ending_page: {
          required
        }, quotation: {
          required,
          minLength: minLength(1),
          $each: {
            text: {

              minLength: minLength(2)
            }
          }
        }
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    addField(value, fieldType) {
      console.log(this.questionForm.quotes)
      fieldType.push({ text: "" });
    },
    removeField(index, fieldType) {
      fieldType.splice(index, 1);
    },
    async submitupdateQuestionForm() {
      this.v$.$touch();

      if (!this.v$.updateQuestionForm.$invalid) {

        const question = await questionServices.updateQuestion(this.updateQuestionForm, this.questionToupdate.id);
        this.updateQuestionForm.question = "";
        this.updateQuestionForm.pageEnd = "";
        this.updateQuestionForm.pageStart = "";
        this.updateQuestionForm.quotation = [{ text: '' }];
        this.v$.updateQuestionForm.$reset()
      }
    },

  },
};
</script>
